thread.title: Winona Ryder experienced every human emotion on stage at the SAGs
thread.title_full: Winona Ryder experienced every human emotion on stage at the SAGs

author: Laura Vitto
title: Winona Ryder experienced every human emotion on stage at the SAGs
text:
Stranger Things took home the award for Outstanding by   during Sunday night's Screen Actor's Guild Awards and it meant a lot to the cast who accepted it.
But it's Winona Ryder's facial expressions during her cast-mate's acceptance speech that deserve some recognition all their own.
SEE ALSO: Barb from 'Stranger Things' is back and killing it on the SAGs red carpet 
While David Harbour gave an unexpectedly passionate speech on behalf of the cast, Ryder, who plays Joyce Byers on the Netflix original, stood by making every possible facial expression known to humankind. 
It was art.





Never change, Winona.
BONUS: Introducing 'Hamster Things'
